Name:
USS Atherton
JDS Hatsuhi
BRP Rajah Humabon
Builder: Federal Shipbuilding and Drydock Company, Newark, New Jersey
Fate:
transferred to the Japan Maritime Self-Defense Force (JMSDF), 14 June 1955
transferred to the Philippine Navy, 13 September 1976
Returned to the United States, 1975
Displacement:
1,240 long tons (1,260 t) standard
1,620 long tons (1,646 t) full
Propulsion: 4 × GM Mod. 16-278A diesel engines with electric drive, 6,000 shp (4,474 kW), 2 screws
Armament:
3 × Mk.22 3"/50 caliber guns
1 × quad 1.1" AA gun
8 × 20 mm Mk.4 AA guns
3 × 21 inch (533 mm) torpedo tubes
1 × Hedgehog Mk.10 anti-submarine mortar (144 rounds)
8 × Mk.6 depth charge projectors
2 × Mk.9 depth charge tracks
